info.name: Make the Taiga HUD less important
info.description: The Taiga HUD is really big and distracting, leaving you with only a very small area with which to work with. These styles hope to push away the crud and maximise usable space. Taiga is still best viewed on 75% magnification.. Also fixes tags - bringing them inline with a story's title.
info.additionalInfo:
==========
CHANGELOG:
==========
2015/10/16
- Remove margin from bottom of tags so that it doesn't affect story height any longer

2015/10/15
- Make it easier to read code blocks and comments by darkening the background

2015/10/14
- Removed the need to scroll horizontally. Should help those without a mac, where native horizontal scrolling isn't simple.
